Row.Text: Our people are now eating your sushi and practicing your martial arts. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.

Knowing now that our prized isolation has been shattered, we have exposed our greatest shame: the weakness of our Imperial Navy and the vulnerability of our coasts. We should employ the most esteemed shipwrights from across the world to aide in the modernisation of our glorious navy.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Japan (Tojo) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Industrialization [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain the Steam Power technology [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive two free Ironclads and two free sources of [ICON_RES_COAL] Coal

Knowing now that our prized isolation has been shattered, we have exposed our greatest shame: the weakness of our Imperial Navy, and the vulnerability of our coasts. We should employ the most esteemed shipwrights from across the world to aide in the modernisation of our glorious navy.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain the Steam Power technology [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive two free Ironclads and two free sources of [ICON_RES_COAL] Coal

The Decisive Battle Doctrine is a naval strategy that maintains that an enemy fleet should be dealt with swiftly and in one single, decisive battle. Although there are concerns amongst the Imperial Navy that Air power shall obsolete this strategy, it would nonetheless prove beneficial if it were to be adopted.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Japan (Tojo) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have entered the Modern Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ranged Naval Units gain +1 Sight and +1 Range whilst stationed in a city

The Decisive Battle Doctrine is a naval strategy that maintains that an enemy fleet should be dealt with swiftly and in one single, decisive battle. Although there are concerns amongst the Imperial Navy that Air power shall obsolete this strategy, it would nonetheless prove beneficial if it were to be adopted.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ranged Naval Units gain +1 Sight and +1 Range whilst stationed in a city

A plot concoted by members of the Imperial Army to overthrow the government has been uncovered and foiled. But the matter has proven divisive within the military. We must act to ensure that the army does not lose its solidarity, and that it remains fiercly united in service to the imperial throne.[NEWLINE]
We must execute the conspirators. There will be no tolerance of discord.
Throw money at the army! Better equipment will strengthen their hearts.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]20% chance that rebels will spawn near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All current Military Land Units gain 5 XP[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]40% chance that rebels will spawn near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy[ENDCOLOR]
We have executed those responsible for a plot to overthrow the government. This seems to have quietened down any discord within the Imperial Army.
We have paid for better equipment for the Imperial Army, which seems to have quietened down any discord within.
We have paid for better equipment for the Imperial Army, but this was not enough to quieten the discord within.
We have pledged to enact political reforms in favour of the military, which seems to have quietened down any discord within.
We have pledged to enact political reforms in favour of the military, but this was not enough to quieten the discord within.
The conspirators of a plot to overthrow the government of Japan have been executed without trial.
A recent plot to overthrow the government of Japan has left the Japanese Imperial Army divided.
A recent plot to overthrow the government of Japan has caused {1_LeaderName} to respond with pledges of support for the military institution.

We have been summoned to the Imperial Palace at the behest of the Emperor, to discuss matters of state. We can only hope that the Emperor is pleased with our continued service to the empire and to the Emperor's family.[NEWLINE]
This is a tremendous honour. We cannot decline.
We were summoned to meet with the Emperor, who praised our continuing devotion to the Japanese Empire.
